body: Firstly thank you for your timely answer, I've made some attempts about points 1),2),2b). The component doesn't crash, but i still see this bleeding component: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Xl3n4nptF*pmL0kTIdfd8TrkBdM0ALkCrJ73rB*YIWu7A5QsK2gESVLELjlk84B4I4-rS1qL1UsoeFHfLQSemfPuaDuJ0DVf/bleed.PNG) while in the imagedBasedSimulation directory it seems to be ok, indeed i see a little HDRimage preview, but not GIF (is it because of "those kind of clash between HB & EmbryoViz?).  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Xl3n4nptF*qe2ax*Cac8KwESAfynaVpamqCsCpTOCXyEWFeYmiNcsNSX6shuZSh6E1DmMDm57Yqm41McUqQ6eDnZoppKvsPL/preview.PNG)
